tips.title: üéØ Early Game (0-50K gems)
items: Click manually - buy click upgrades to increase power
Buy your first Miner at 25 gems (produces 0.1 gems/sec)
Focus on generators first - multipliers are expensive now!
Save 50K for Auto-Clicker (was 5K, now rebalanced)
Don't buy multipliers too early - bad value

tips.title: ‚öôÔ∏è Mid Game (50K-1M gems)
items: Now you can afford first multiplier (Click Boost: 10K)
Get Mining Efficiency (+20% generator production)
Buy high-tier generators (Crystal Cave, Deep Shaft)
Unlock shop items (Smart Notifications: 250K)
Start saving for cosmetics (Golden Particles: 500K)

tips.title: üöÄ Late Game (1M-2.5M gems)
items: Multipliers are now worth it - but EXPENSIVE!
Buy 2nd tier multipliers (Hand Amplifier: 250K, Automation: 350K)
Purchase powerful shop items (Golden Touch: 2.5M)
Collect cosmetics - they don't reset on prestige!
Prestige becomes available at 2.5M total earned

tips.title: ‚≠ê Prestige Strategy
items: First prestige at 2.5M total earned (was 1M - rebalanced!)
Each prestige point = +5% to ALL production
Prestige scaling: 2.5M ‚Üí 3.75M ‚Üí 5.6M (1.5x harder each time)
Milestones, achievements, and cosmetics are KEPT!
Shop purchases are KEPT through prestige!

tips.title: üé® Cosmetics Guide
items: Press '5' to open Cosmetics tab - separate from shop!
Buy cosmetics, then equip in Settings (Press '0')
4 gem skins (Ruby, Sapphire, Emerald, Amethyst)
4 premium themes (change entire color scheme)
6 particle effects (different colors when clicking)
Cosmetics are cosmetic only - no gameplay advantage!

tips.title: üíé Pro Tips
items: Auto-Clicker scales with click power - invest in both!
Multipliers are now SMALL bonuses (+20-40%) but stack
Don't buy all multipliers - focus on best value
Daily rewards increase with streaks - login daily!
Use keyboard shortcuts (0-9) for faster play
Smart Notifications (250K shop) alerts when you can prestige
Milestones at 1M, 100M, 1B, 1T give permanent bonuses
Game is single-player - play at your own pace!
